name: SlipDrive
description: Slipdrive is a simple, but fast paced game designed to provide a challenge and test your reflexes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5-750 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum Requirements w/ VR Disabled
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space
